distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
,
from code
order by ${orderByClause}

from code
order by ${orderByClause}

XTLB,

DMZ,

DMLB = #{record.dmlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMZ = #{record.dmz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMSX = #{record.dmsx,jdbcType=CHAR},
